description.value:
Rite of the Fetish
Mystic Rite • Level 3

Time: 8 hours
Cost: 5 Gnosis
Requirement: An awakened spirit, a suitable vessel, and access to the Umbra. A failed agreement may have narrative consequences.

Description

The Rite of the Fetish binds an awakened spirit into a physical object, creating a Fetish — a sacred item that channels spiritual power through material form.

Fetishes are not tools; they are agreements, forged through ritual, negotiation, and sacrifice.

This Rite does not create power. It gives power a place to dwell.

Effect

When the Gnosis cost is paid, the Rite succeeds automatically.

Choose:

  • One awakened spirit (see Rite of Spirit Awakening)
  • One non-magical object suitable to house that spirit

The spirit is bound into the object, transforming it into a Fetish.

A Fetish:

  • Is considered a magical item
  • Retains its own personality and will
  • Possesses one or more abilities defined in the Fetish section of this document

Using a Fetish

Activating a Fetish's power requires either:

  • A Gnosis Roll equal to the Fetish's rating, or
  • Spending 1 Gnosis to activate it automatically

Fetish abilities, ratings, and limitations are detailed in the Fetish section. A Fetish may refuse to activate if its wielder violates its nature or agreement.

Mechanical Clarifications

This Rite:

  • Does not determine the Fetish's abilities
  • Does not guarantee the spirit's cooperation
  • Does not override Fetish activation limits
  • The spirit remains bound but not enslaved
  • Destroying the Fetish releases the spirit

Limitations

This Rite cannot bind:

  • Major spirits, gods, or unique entities
  • Spirits unwilling to be bound

A Garou may only attempt to create a Fetish if the spirit agrees or has been properly bargained with.

Narrative Use

The Rite of the Fetish is central to Garou culture and legacy. Many Fetishes are passed down through generations, carrying memory, expectation, and obligation alongside power.

"A Fetish is not owned. It is endured."
